charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Lacey and
Granbull playing on the beach.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1101_0200_2:
When [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] approached to see what they were
doing...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_0400_1:
Let me show you something cute I just caught
on camera!
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_0500_1:
See? It’s some sleeping Pokémon using Granbull’s
belly as a pillow! Isn’t that cute?
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_0600_1:
I was actually planning to use Granbull for a nap
myself, like I always do...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_0700_1:
but then some Trainers’ Pokémon appeared out of
nowhere and stole my Granbull pillow!
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_0800_1:
Still...it was so adorable, I took a photo to capture
that cuteness forever!
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_0900_1:
Whenever I discover something cute, it makes
Granbull happy too.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1000_1:
So she’s usually the first one I share things like
that with.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1100_1:
She’s always by my side—she’s a Pokémon I can
be proud of!
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1200_1: Her soft belly and floppy ears...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1300_1: Her squishy arms and hard fangs...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1400_1: Aaah! Everything about her is just so darn cute!
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1500_1: Anyway, Granbull sure is cute, but also...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1600_1:
There’s something about her shape and attitude
that reminds me of Daddy...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1700_1:
Maybe that’s why I feel so safe and at ease
around her.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_1800_1:
What impression do you get from Granbull,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_0401_2000_1:
Hmmm... Yes, I suppose that’s one way to look
at her.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_0302_2100_1: Looks like it’d hurt if she bit me...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_0402_2200_1:
Her fangs ARE pretty large and eye-catching,
aren’t they.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_2300_1: It’s true Granbull can look scary...
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_2400_1: But she’s actually a calm and sensitive Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_2500_1:
If you get her angry, though, then she IS just as
scary as she looks. So watch out!
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_2600_1:
Daddy, too. As long as you don’t make him mad,
he’s not as scary as he looks.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_2700_1:
But there are some people who up and flee just at
the sound of his name.
charaepi_ch0352_00_taro/2301_1201_2800_1: I guess Granbull and Daddy really are similar!
